name: Word Explorer
description:
Word Explorer is a very absorbing spelling word search games for your spare time. Word Explorer is a relaxing Word game where you connect letters together to form words on a crossword-style board. Learn while you play! With over 5000 levels and thousands of words ranging from simple to complex, Word Explorer will help you become a true Word Master.

The best combination of free word games, crossword puzzles, word connect and word search games - Word Explorer app was designed for all players who'd love to escape to a 'wordscape' land of relaxation and fun. Show off your puzzle solving, spelling, and anagram word skills as you search for the best scoring word combination in this exciting, free, new, word game.

From New York to L.A. and around the globe, jump on this addictive letters-combining, word connecting adventure to discover new crosswords challenges and enrich your vocabulary at the same time:

- Exercise your brain with thousands of challenging word puzzles.

- Test your word games skills, enhance your vocabulary and unlock new Word Explorer levels as you climb the vocabulary ladder. How many of the 5000+ levels are you prepare to unlock?

- Earn gold coins every step of this exciting word search game adventure!
